item.title: Market Maker
item.description:
Market Maker

The Orson & Co crew meeting with Sir John Hegarty and the team at The Garage Soho. Sir John shaped many of the most famous ad campaigns, including Audi's famous Vorsprung Durch Technik.

item.title: Steve's Boss
item.description:
Steve's Boss

Talking to Man, Myth, Legend, John Sculley @johnsculley. Inventor of the Pepsi Challenge, Apple CEO, Jeff Daniels lookalike and incredibly nice person at Web Summit 2015 in Dublin.

item.title: The 20 most popular TED Talks of all time
item.description:
The 20 most popular TED Talks of all time

Are schools killing creativity? What makes a great leader? How can I find happiness? These 20 talks are the ones that you and your fellow TED fans just can't stop sharing.

item.title: Summon Tesla Model S using just your Apple Watch
item.description:
Summon Tesla Model S using just your Apple Watch

Tesla recently launched the new Autopilot update v7.1 along with Summon feature for its Model S, which enables users to remotely operate their vehicle or move their vehicle in and out of the garage without anyone actually driving it.

item.title: Dublin Web Summit: Drones could do your household chores in five years
item.description:
Dublin Web Summit: Drones could do your household chores in five years

Drones, the kind that Google hopes to use for air deliveries in 2017, could be ready for household use in five years, according to drone and aerial photography company DJI. "In three years we've gone from remote-controlled tech to smart tech.

item.title: Virtual Memories
item.description:
Virtual Memories

New game Firewatch will print out and mail you photos that you snap in the game http://buff.ly/1Q4lFxA

item.title: Phantom Technology
item.description:
Phantom Technology

Backstage at Websummit with renowned photographer and DJI spokesperson Randy Braun.Â

item.title: IDEO, Silicon Valley's Most Influential Design Firm, Sells A Minority Stake
item.description:
IDEO, Silicon Valley's Most Influential Design Firm, Sells A Minority Stake

In a response to "pendulum swings" in the design landscape, IDEO, the global consultancy known for its human-centered approach, has become part of Kyu Collective, a group of businesses in the creative industry owned by Tokyo-based Hakuhodo DY Holdings.

item.title: Moonshot
item.description:
Moonshot

Chris Van Der Kuyl launching Entrepreneurial Scotland's mission to become the world's most entrepreneurial country. - Gleneagles 2015.
